name: Love in 20,000 leagues under the sea
name_original: Love in 20,000 leagues under the sea
description:
You wake up after being shipwrecked in the middle of the sea and try to find your way back home.

ControlsKeyboardMoveWASDLookMouseInteractEUse sonarLMB

Credits:

  • Schrodinger - Team lead, Programming, Game Design(itch.io, Github)
  • SaveLay - Modelling, Texturing(itch.io)
  • Shutnek - Mapping, Playtesting(itch.io)

Assets used:

Unity PSX shader from Kodrin

Particles by hc

Sound:

  • Footsteps by Bart
  • Door SFX by Bart
  • Enemy attack by LogLogSounds

Note: game is not finished, i hope we will be able to bring some updates in the future!
